results.title: Influence of lisinopril on cardiac remodeling induced by tobacco smoke exposure.
results.text_hl: MATERIAL/METHODS: @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@ were allocated into 3 groups: group CON (n=8): control; group @<m>DISEASE_Choreoathetosis_Spasticity_Episodic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563401 @@@CSE@@@ (n=8): cigarette smoke exposure; group @<m>DISEASE_Choreoathetosis_Spasticity_Episodic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563401 @@@CSE@@@-LIS (n=8): exposed to @SPECIES_4097 @@@tobacco@@@ smoke and treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Duarte DR, Minicucci MF, Azevedo PS, Chiuso-Minicucci F, Matsubara BB, Matsubara LS, Campana AO, Paiva SA, Zornoff LA. Influence of lisinopril on cardiac remodeling induced by tobacco smoke exposure. Med Sci Monit. 2010 Aug;16(8):BR255-9. PMID: 20671606
